t: How to Sell Pet Products on Amazon
s: June 17, 2023 - According to Similarweb data, pet product sales on Amazon reached $18.2 billion in 2023, a massive 24.6% increase from the previous year. Analysts forecast the Category to climb another 25.3% in 2024. The best-selling pet brand on Amazon in 2023 was Blue Buffalo, with $391 million in sales.
